title: bots in aram?
body: just had aram with brother im level 15 hes 30 there was 4 real players 6 bots whats up with this?

replies.body:
Bot 'players' in aram is a real problem. every solo or duo aram seems to have a bot in it. easy to pick as they buy 2 pair of boots and just walk up the lane, usually to die under enemy turret.  Getting a bit sick of this.

Naturally I do report bots, feeders, afk etc in any game i play.

Hey **RAGEPANTZ**,

At this time, you can either report a player at the post-game screen for cheating or you can submit a ticket:

For players who commit offenses outside of matches or who violate the Terms of Service but don't fall under one of the standard categories, you can send Riot a report by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot Games Player Support with a screenshot of the said offenses and any additional information that you'd like to add. 

If you're unsure where to put your ticket in, just select:
[*I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.*] > [*Game and Features*] > [*General Questions*]

Thank you for your diligence.
I just had an ARAM game with 4 bots on my team and 3 on the other team. I'm lvl 10. Just started happening within the past couple days but I didn't figure out what was going on until today.
